This example shows different CoordinatorLayout usage examples, like the use of 'anchor' in views, flexible space and some more tips.


This code has also been used as an example for the presentation given at the Spanish GDG Summit 2015: 'Tools and tips of the trade for the Android developer'. Whose slides will be published soon :)

array.name: long_text
array.item: Food items, directly made out of our home kitchen with super fresh raw items with stringent quality check to provide you the best hygienic food and taste you wanted.
With 100% food grade, 100% microwaveable, 100% hygienic food plates, you get the best quality that can be provided. Proper calorie analysis is done to keep you healthy.
We offer you the best price in market, so that you can afford it. Eat foods that you always wanted. Not Yet!! Great discounts on top of that for early birds. Order quickly!!
